mapper.select:
SELECT PRODUCT_NO, NAME, QUANTITY, PRICE, STORED_FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.NAME, P.QUANTITY, P.PRICE, P.STORED_FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO, NAME, QUANTITY, PRICE, STORED_FILE_NAME FROM PRODUCT
ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC) P )PRODUCT WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert:
SELECT PRODUCT_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PRODUCT( PRODUCT_NO, NAME, QUANTITY, PRICE, DETAIL, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, ENROLLMENT_DATE ) VALUES( #{productNo}, #{name}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{detail}, #{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET NAME = #{name}, QUANTITY = #{quantity}, PRICE = #{price}, DETAIL = #{detail}, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME = #{originalFileName}, STORED_FILE_NAME = #{storedFileName}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize} WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo};
